Title: Ron and Tammys
Plot: Ron's first ex-wife, Tammy One, reenters his life and tries to control his every move. Meanwhile, Ben helps Tom balance the books at his new company, and Ann makes a PSA, with help from Chris.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Megan Mullally, Patricia Clarkson, Ben Schwartz, Paula Pell, Detlef Schrempf
